title: (x) Official Sesame Street geometric sans - customized Futura {Mark S}
content:
The photo is of a somewhat wrinkled photostat, so some of the letterforms are a bit distorted. Basically it’s some cut of Futura, but I’m thrown by the I, the lower j, and the 4. Anyone?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312190441im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/OffSSFont_4661.jpg)

 [‹ "An Original Penguin" logo retro script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312190441/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40839 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Wells Fargo Home Mortgage wordmark slab serif - Clarendon {Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312190441/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40887 "Go to next forum topic")
author: the_warren

comments.content: It’s a bad knockoff of Futura. I can’t imagine it being “official”.
I don’t think it’s a knock-off of Futura. It _is_ Futura, with a few letters modified, probably by the Sesame Street art department, for use on the show.

**Mark Simonson** : <cite>I don’t think it’s a knock-off of Futura. It is Futura, with a few letters modified, probably by the Sesame Street art department, for use on the show.</cite>

Yeah, that’s what my suspicion is. Thanks.
